segments.text: I notice the woman by the sink, completely unaware of her surroundings.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is overflowing, and she's just standing there, drying a plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't believe how calm she seems, even with the puddle forming at her feet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children behind her are being so sneaky, trying to get cookies from the jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is climbing on that stool, and it looks like it's about to tip over.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope he doesn't fall and hurt himself.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just standing there, waiting for a cookie, completely unaware of the danger.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder what's going to happen next.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The scene outside the window is so peaceful, it's like a different world.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel like I should say something, but I don't want to interrupt the moment.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This is all so fascinating and yet a bit unsettling.
segments.speaker: PAR
